================
**shell.mkpk**
================

Contents
^^^^^^^^
| :ref:`shell-linking`
| :ref:`shell-data`
| :ref:`shell-functions`

.. _shell-linking:

Linking
^^^^^^^

.. code-block::

    !link stdlib/shell.mkpk

Links with
^^^^^^^^^^
| - :doc:`lib_syscall`

.. _shell-data:

Data
^^^^
| PROGRAM_BIN_SH: "/bin/sh"
| PROGRAM_BIN_BASH: "/bin/bash"

.. _shell-functions:

Functions
^^^^^^^^^
| [bin_sh]
| *Runs /bin/sh.*

| [bin_bash]
| *Runs /bin/bash.*
